metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47024 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A null pointer dereference issue was discovered in function gui_x11_create_blank_mouse in gui_x11.c in vim 8.1.2269 thru 9.0.0339 allows attackers to cause denial of service or other unspecified impacts.

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
